response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 by us due to its unique features, superior materials, and the extensive research and development that went into its creation. We believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its unparalleled value, we kindly propose an offer of $14,500 for this product. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 14500}
